title: Data Scientist
description:
We are planning to hire a Data Scientist / Business Analyst for our growing Data Science

& Analytics practice to join our Retail Analytics Team. This is a high octane team delivering

analytic solutions, high quality services and insights for business resulting in direct

Business Growth and strategy formulations.




Roles & Responsibilities:

● The individual will be responsible for running Portfolio Insights, Reject Inferencing,

Bureau Data Analysis, Cross-Sell Analysis, Personalization projects etc using AI/ML

techniques.

● Provide technical prowess, including guiding the other team members on best

practices in data analysis, modeling techniques, model monitoring and tool selection

etc.

● Manage project initiatives for the Product Analytics team, ensuring alignment with

business goals and timely delivery of high-impact results

● Investigate user behavior patterns to identify opportunities for improving product adoption,

engagement, and retention of our observability tools

● Develop and implement strategies to build product stickiness and reduce churn, including

the creation and tracking of relevant metrics for observability products

● Track KPIs across the product organization and perform root cause analysis on significa

changes or anomalies

● Collaborate closely with Data Engineering/Business/Credit & Risk teams to ensure data

quality, accessibility, and efficient pipeli

● Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation of analytics processes,

methodologies, and findin

● Foster a positive team culture that promotes innovation, collaboration, and continuous

learning




Knowledge & Experience:




● Minimum of 2 years of experience in advanced Analytics and data science in BFSI

domain

● Python programming skills for data manipulation, analysis, and DS modeling

● Solid understanding of statistical concepts and their application in business contexts

● Hands-on experience with modeling and predictive analytics techniques such as

Supervised learning, Unsupervised learning, Time series analysis etc.

● Model evaluation metrics and validation techniques (cross-validation, ROC curves,

confusion matrices) * Some background in model deployment in production and model

monitoring

● Expertise in data visualization and dashboard creation, particularly with either of Power

BI/Tableau/Looker Studio etc.

● Proficiency in SQL for complex data querying and analys

● Familiarity with data transformation and modeling and Bureau Data Analysis

● Strong data visualization and storytelling abilities to communicate insights effectively

● Experience with Analytics best practices and establishing data governance

● Strong leadership skills, including the ability to motivate and inspire team members

● Proven ability to manage multiple priorities and deliver results in a fast-paced environment
